channel.title: Game theory on The Little Dataset
channel.description: Recent content in Game theory on The Little Dataset

item.title: Ultimate Game Theory
item.description: An intro to the melted, gooey mind of a post-finals PhD student In the days preceding my game theory final, I was quarantined in my Cambridge apartment. The heat was on and pages of yellow legal paper decorated with inky matrices and tree diagrams ruled my kitchen counters. Swaddled in some convex combination of polar fleece and section notes, I would only leave my warm fortress to (1) throw $4 at an increasingly hard-to-please chai tea habit, and (2) play and train for my sport of choice–that is, ultimate frisbee.
